annotation_sentence: Hello! Um, it's good. Just looking around market, see what is... uh, interesting.

annotation_sentence: Yes, I want to buy... how you say... basket for fruit, lah?
rationale: The sentence contains multiple speech acts: an affirmation ('Yes'), an expression of desire ('I want to buy'), a request for clarification ('how you say'), a specification ('basket for fruit'), and a discourse particle ('lah').

annotation_sentence: Yes, please! I not so good at this, often too shy.

annotation_sentence: Yes, he say, uh, only small discount. So I ask more?

annotation_sentence: Alright. Can you give... larger discount if I buy more things?

annotation_sentence: Okay, I will do that. Thank you for help!

annotation_sentence: Thanks again. I will try my best. Have nice day!
